Talk_0501:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:SurpriseL_00>Whoa! Those are my <clr:0000>white goats<clr:ffff>!<sp:5:1:0> So this
is where they ran off to...
Talk_0522_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>A perfect investigation with a happy
ending!<sp:5:1:0> And all without me even knowing!
<sp:5:1:0>I'd expect nothing less from you.
Talk_0009:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Hey, buddy... Have you seen some <clr:0000>white
goats<clr:ffff> around here?

I'd given those goats all the love and care
in the world, but the other day, they ran
off together.
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>They didn't even finish all their food
before they left—the <clr:0000>Hylian pine cones<clr:ffff>
weren't eaten!
<sp:0:2:2:5000>I followed Princess Zelda's recipe perfectly... But
could it have been the feed that drove them off?<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_0502:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Ease>There, there...<sp:5:1:0> I'm just so glad to see you!
Are you all OK?
Talk_0010:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>My poor white goats... Where did you run
off to?

And why didn't you finish all your food
from that great recipe? The <clr:0000>Hylian pine
cones <clr:ffff>weren't even touched...
Talk_0503:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>And you're the one who found them?<sp:5:0:0>
Thank you! I won't forget this!
Talk_0011:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Yeah! <clr:0000>Princess Zelda <clr:ffff>shared a recipe
when she visited the stable a while back.

<sp:3:0:2:0000>It's really amazing how much she knows
about animals. I never would've expected
her to be developing healthy feed recipes!
In this case, it's a recipe for a special
kind of feed for white goats. The main
ingredient is fresh <clr:0000>Hylian pine cones<clr:ffff>.
<sp:3:0:2:0800>It's actually pretty unusual—it requires
you to mix the pine cones in whole. You
don't grind them down or anything!
Talk_0504:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:Notice_00>This bottle... <sp:5:1:0>This is what I was using to
keep Princess Zelda's recipe safe!

Let me see it—<sp:5:1:0>I need to check the recipe.
Talk_0012:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I just can't believe that someone like
Princess Zelda would make a feed that
the <clr:0000>white goats<clr:ffff> would hate so much.
<sp:3:0:2:0a01>What could have caused them to run away
like that?
Talk_0506:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseS>"Grind the pine cones into a powder."<sp:5:1:0>
I'm not supposed to use the <clr:0000>Hylian
pine cone<clr:ffff> whole?!
<sp:3:0:2:0a01>I should have known something was off.
It did look really hard to eat...
Talk_0507:
My poor, sweet goats! They must have
run off because of the awful food I was
making them eat...
Talk_0508:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I'm so sorry. <sp:5:0:0>I hurt you all when I thought
I was helping!

It was my fault all along.<sp:5:0:0> I would have run
away too.
Talk_0509:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01>I can't believe I doubted the recipe that
Princess Zelda shared with me...
Talk_0510:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>I swear that from now on, I will take care
of you all with the same kindness and
compassion that Princess Zelda displays.
That's the best way to show my gratitude
for her sharing the recipe with me.
Talk_0018:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>If you still haven't talked to the stable
hand Chork, go and talk to him now!

<sp:3:0:2:0801>We've got to solve this mystery!
Talk_0511:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Happy_01>Oh, and I really, really can't thank you
enough for finding my white goats. And
the recipe!
<sp:3:0:2:0000>We're going to head back to the stable.<sp:5:1:0>
You take care!
Near_Report_1021:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>You saved me from a serious problem.<sp:5:0:0>
I can't even find the words to thank you.

From now on, my wonderful <clr:0000>white goats<clr:ffff>
eat only the best <clr:0000>feed<clr:ffff>. For sure this time!
Near_Report_1022:
<sp:3:0:2:0301>I'll never doubt <clr:0000>Princess Zelda<clr:ffff> again.
It was awful for me to think she'd harm
my goats in the first place!
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Amazing what panic and worry can do to
you. But I'm past it now!

I hope I see <clr:0000>Princess<clr:ffff> <clr:0000>Zelda <clr:ffff>in the future.
I feel like I need to thank her all over
again for giving me this recipe.
Talk_0024:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Keep up the hard work, partner!<sp:5:1:0> The
answer to this mystery is close! I can
feel it!
Talk_0509_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_01>I should have noticed my mistake right
away.<sp:5:0:0> After all, I really do want to take
the best possible care of the goats...
But it's not just about what kind of food
you feed them, right? It's important to
show them you care with all your heart!
Talk_0011_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>I didn't want my wonderful white goats to
eat the recipe the princess gave me, so I
put it in a glass bottle...
<sp:3:0:2:0700>But a big storm came through one day,
and it blew the bottle off somewhere.

I wasn't able to find it after that, so I've
been making the recipe from memory
since then.
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>But what would make my <clr:0000>white goats<clr:ffff> spit
up the <clr:0000>Hylian pine cones<clr:ffff> and run off
like that?
Did they... Did they really hate Princess
Zelda's recipe that much?
Talk_0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Hm. <sp:5:0:0>Hardly a trace of a <clr:0000>recipe <clr:ffff>remains...<sp:5:1:0>
Just the remnants of half-eaten <clr:0000>Hylian
pine cones<clr:ffff>...
Talk_0523:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Hmmm. Do you think it's a coincidence
that the missing white goats and the lost
recipe were in the same place?
I have another theory...<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughS>Maybe the white goats set out to find the
bottle themselves because they couldn't
stand to eat the wrong recipe anymore.
I don't think that's the case,<sp:5:0:0> but it does
make you wonder, doesn't it?
Talk_0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Hey, partner! You're looking good!
Were you also pulled to this place by
the inescapable tug of a story?
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I'm chasing some new chirps and warbles
from my beloved little birds.
Talk_0524:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>All right! I'm gonna hurry back to HQ and
bring word of this story's conclusion to
our readers!
See ya later, partner! I look forward to
chasing another big scoop with you!
Talk_0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>A group of goats is a herd, or a trip, or a
tribe... <sp:5:0:0>Anyway, this stable has been
raising a small herd of <clr:0000>white goats<clr:ffff>.
Or it was until all those <clr:0000>white goats<clr:ffff> up
and vanished all of a sudden.

<sp:3:0:2:0c00>That's not where it stops though. Some
have said that Princess Zelda may also
be involved...
Talk_0005_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>So the white goats were being given a
feed that Princess Zelda created the
recipe for...
It's hard to believe that Princess Zelda
would teach anyone a nonsense recipe.
That doesn't seem like her at all...
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Maybe you can learn more about the <clr:0000>feed
recipe<clr:ffff> from <clr:0000>Chork<clr:ffff>?

I'm going to poke around and see if I can
turn up any other information.
Talk_0032:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Hey, partner! <sp:5:0:0>I love that you've got the
energy to search for a scoop this early!<sp:5:1:0>
How's it going? You find any leads?
Talk_0004:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Anyway. Why don't you talk with <clr:0000>Chork<clr:ffff>,
the <clr:0000>guy who was taking care of the
white goats<clr:ffff>. I'll look for more clues.
Talk_0005_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Chork says the bottle that he kept
Princess Zelda's <clr:0000>recipe <clr:ffff>in was <clr:0000>blown
off somewhere by the wind<clr:ffff>...
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>As a result, the feed he's been giving to
his white goats was made from what he
could remember of the recipe.
I can't believe that Princess Zelda would
teach anyone a nonsense recipe. That
doesn't seem like her at all...
It's important that we find these
white goats...<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700>But I think we should also find the <clr:0000>recipe<clr:ffff>.
That might shine some light on what
exactly Princess Zelda was up to.
I'm going to poke around and see if I can
turn up any other information.
Talk_0033:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Hey, partner! How's it going? You find
any leads?
Talk_0005:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>It looks like you caught up with the <clr:0000>stable
hand<clr:ffff> <clr:0000>Chork<clr:ffff> about what happened...
Talk_0034:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Hey, partner! <sp:5:0:0>You're still tracking down
leads this late? Impressive!<sp:5:1:0> How's it
going? You find anything?
Talk_0006:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Happy_00>Partner, time for you to get to work!<sp:5:1:0>
There's a big scoop here, I can feel it!
Talk_0035:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Hey, partner! <sp:5:0:0>The rain has a nasty habit of
washing away clues...<sp:5:1:0> How's your search
going? You find any leads?
Talk_0007:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><clr:0000><snd:Think><clr:ffff>Where have the <clr:0000>white goats <clr:ffff>gone?<sp:5:1:0>
Why did they escape in the first place?<sp:5:1:0>
And how is <clr:0000>Princess Zelda <clr:ffff>involved?<sp:5:0:0>
<sp:3:0:2:0801>The more mysteries there are, the brighter
a reporter's spirit burns!
Talk_0522_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>A perfect investigation with a happy
ending! <sp:5:1:0>I'd expect nothing less from you.
